title: Is Mamaearth onion hair oil good for hair? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is good but not as effective as home made onion juice. Because these companies has not mentioned the quantity of ingredients they have added. My advice is to make onion juice at home. Take one onion in juice and strain the juice using handkerchief, apply for at least one hour and than wash with your regular shampoo. If you find this helpful please upvote and follow. Feel free to ask any doubt.

I have been using Moms Co nourishing oik which is made of natural ingredients and it contains a combination of 8 powerful oil which helps to strengthen the hair and also use protein shampoo and conditioner which keeps hair soft and smooth and strengthen the hair and promote hair growth
